alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, southwestern Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Fowler to 18 miles south of Boone. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility at times Locations impacted include... Fowler, Manzanola, Olney Springs and Crowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
